CustomField.formula: AND ( OR( AND( !ISBlank( Bid_Number_1__c ) , Left( Stage_ID__c, 1 )= "1" ), AND( !ISBlank( Bid_Number_2a__c ) , Left( Stage_ID__c, 1 )= "2" ), AND( !ISBlank( Bid_Number_3a__c ) , Left( Stage_ID__c, 1 )= "3" ), AND( !ISBlank( Bid_Number_4a__c ) , Left( Stage_ID__c, 1 )= "4" )), LastModifiedById = "00558000000VjOEAA0")
CustomField.label: Bid Old Version
